==== Notes ====
# BIOS must be at least version F.16A in order for the sleep/suspend to work. Although this is untested, it is presumed that sleep will also work on 8.10, if the laptop is running on the latest BIOS.
# Wifi (wireless) works perfectly out-of-the-box, and does not require driver installation.
